// num2_num1_out_cout
0000_0000_0000_0  // 0 + 0 = 0
0001_0000_0001_0  // 1 + 0 = 1
0000_0001_0001_0  // 0 + 1 = 1
0001_0001_0010_0  // 1 + 1 = 2
0010_0010_0100_0  // 2 + 2 = 4
0011_0011_0110_0  // 3 + 3 = 6
0100_0100_1000_0  // 4 + 4 = 8
0101_0101_1010_0  // 5 + 5 = 10
0110_0110_1100_0  // 6 + 6 = 12
0111_0111_1110_0  // 7 + 7 = 14
1000_1000_0000_1  // 8 + 8 = 16 (0, cout=1)
1001_1001_0010_1  // 9 + 9 = 18 (2, cout=1)
1010_1010_0100_1  // 10 + 10 = 20 (4, cout=1)
1011_1011_0110_1  // 11 + 11 = 22 (6, cout=1)
1100_1100_1000_1  // 12 + 12 = 24 (8, cout=1)
1101_1101_1010_1  // 13 + 13 = 26 (10, cout=1)
1110_1110_1100_1  // 14 + 14 = 28 (12, cout=1)
1111_1111_1110_1  // 15 + 15 = 30 (14, cout=1)
0101_1010_1111_0  // 5 + 10 = 15
1111_0001_0000_1  // 15 + 1 = 16 (0, cout=1)
0001_1111_0000_1  // 1 + 15 = 16 (0, cout=1)
1000_0111_1111_0  // 8 + 7 = 15
0000_1111_1111_0  // 0 + 15 = 15
1111_0000_1111_0  // 15 + 0 = 15
